---
title: "Mammella — Casi MTB (HR+/HER2− e TNBC)"
---

```{r}
library(readr); library(dplyr); library(gt)
som <- read_csv("data/breast_variants_somatic.csv")
germ <- read_csv("data/breast_variants_germline.csv")
```

### Sintesi clinica
```{{=include}} templates/clinical_breast.md

### HR+/HER2− — Varianti di interesse
```{r}
som %>% filter(case=="HRpos_HER2neg") %>% select(-case) %>% 
  gt() |> tab_caption("HR+/HER2− — Varianti somatiche")
```

### TNBC — Varianti di interesse
```{r}
som %>% filter(case=="TNBC") %>% select(-case) %>% 
  gt() |> tab_caption("TNBC — Varianti somatiche")
```

### Germinale
```{r}
gt(germ) |> tab_caption("Mammella — Varianti germinali")
```

::: callout-note
- *PIK3CA* **p.H1047R** → considerare **alpelisib** + ET in HR+/HER2−.
- *BRCA1* patogena (TNBC) → **PARP**; invio a genetica medica.
:::
